participant_1.background:
I've never told my parents about the time I stole a car.
i still live with my parents.
my favorite band used to be toto.
i do not like music.
My hair is a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.

participant_2.background:
Music is a way for me to express myself.
i have a personal trainer.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I enjoy helping animals and learning about animal welfare.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing music, helping animals, and learning about animal welfare.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never really been a music person, but I enjoy learning new things.
What have you been learning about lately?
I have been learning about the history of the world. I find it really interesting to learn about how different cultures have developed over time.
That sounds really interesting! I have always been curious about history, but I haven't had much time to learn about it.
It's never too late to start learning! There are so many great resources available online and at the library.
That's true! I'll have to check out some books at the library.
That would be great! I'm sure you'll find something you're interested in.
